topics.body:
"So we're gonna fight. If you win you get my sword!"

"But what if we lose? What do you want?"

"I want you to marry me Togame!"

"Waaaahhh! You don't want our swords?!"

"Swords are for chumps. I want your sweet gam-gams!"

That's pretty much how that conversation went.
